00001 #include <stdbool.h>
00002 #include <inttypes.h>
00003 #include <stdio.h>
00004 #include <sys/select.h>
00005 #include <unistd.h>
00006 #include <assert.h>
00007 
00008 #define STDINOUT_BUFFER_SIZE 256
00009 #define FD_STDIN 0
00010 
00011 extern char stdinout_buffer[STDINOUT_BUFFER_SIZE];
00012 extern uint8_t stdinout_rx_insert_idx;
00013 extern uint8_t stdinout_rx_extract_idx;
00014 
00015 
00016 static inline bool StdInOutChAvailable(void) {
00017   struct timeval tv;
00018   fd_set fds;
00019   tv.tv_sec = 0;
00020   tv.tv_usec = 0;
00021   FD_ZERO(&fds);
00022   FD_SET(FD_STDIN, &fds);
00023   select(1, &fds, NULL, NULL, &tv);
00024   if (FD_ISSET(FD_STDIN, &fds)) {
00025     char tmp_buf[STDINOUT_BUFFER_SIZE];
00026     uint8_t n = read(FD_STDIN, tmp_buf, STDINOUT_BUFFER_SIZE);
00027     unsigned int i;
00028     for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00029       stdinout_buffer[stdinout_rx_insert_idx] = tmp_buf[i];
00030       stdinout_rx_insert_idx++; /* Auto overflow */
00031     }
00032   }
00033   return (stdinout_rx_insert_idx != stdinout_rx_extract_idx);
00034 }
00035 
00036 #define StdInOutTransmit(_char) putchar(_char)
00037 #define StdInOutGetch() ({ \
00038   assert(stdinout_rx_insert_idx != stdinout_rx_extract_idx); \
00039   stdinout_buffer[stdinout_rx_extract_idx++]; \
00040 })
